about_the_game:
You've been waiting for this for a long time and now it's finally here. A new game about the famous Santa Claus. In this game the main role could play Brad Pitt, but unfortunately we did not have any money and so Santa agreed to play the role of himself. Although he was very busy these days preparing gifts for children, but still took time out and we did it

-Although with Brad Pitt would be more epic

You are waiting for an unforgettable adventure on 30 short and monotypical levels with the same enemies, where you need to do the same thing from time to time.

-But no. Not like that.

You are waiting for an unforgettable adventure on 30 detailed levels, where at every step you will be in danger. After all, the evil trolls have stolen all the presents

-Please don't ask “why?”. We didn't have enough budget to come up with that

So all the presents are stolen and only Achilles can save Christmas, oops sorry, that's Santa. On the level you will meet a huge number of dangers, a variety of enemies

-There are as many as 3 types - all the same budget

and of course bosses which will be oh how difficult to defeat

-spoiler: the second boss is a dragon, you ask “what does a dragon have to do with trolls and goblins?”. - who cares? Every cool game has a dragon because everyone loves dragons

Anyway, the game is cool, it captures the Christmas mood and if all the people on Steam play it, maybe we will have arguments to invite Brett to the sequel of the game (think about how cool it will be).

Thanks for your attention. I'll leave some generated description from chatGPT below (I didn't want to, but trends oblige)

Key Features:

- 30 handcrafted levels filled with variety and challenges.

- 3 epic boss battles against the goblin king and his minions.

- Beautiful, festive visuals that capture the holiday spirit.

- Charming soundtrack to keep you in the Christmas mood.

- Accessible gameplay for players of all ages.
detailed_description:
You've been waiting for this for a long time and now it's finally here. A new game about the famous Santa Claus. In this game the main role could play Brad Pitt, but unfortunately we did not have any money and so Santa agreed to play the role of himself. Although he was very busy these days preparing gifts for children, but still took time out and we did it

-Although with Brad Pitt would be more epic

You are waiting for an unforgettable adventure on 30 short and monotypical levels with the same enemies, where you need to do the same thing from time to time.

-But no. Not like that.

You are waiting for an unforgettable adventure on 30 detailed levels, where at every step you will be in danger. After all, the evil trolls have stolen all the presents

-Please don't ask “why?”. We didn't have enough budget to come up with that

So all the presents are stolen and only Achilles can save Christmas, oops sorry, that's Santa. On the level you will meet a huge number of dangers, a variety of enemies

-There are as many as 3 types - all the same budget

and of course bosses which will be oh how difficult to defeat

-spoiler: the second boss is a dragon, you ask “what does a dragon have to do with trolls and goblins?”. - who cares? Every cool game has a dragon because everyone loves dragons

Anyway, the game is cool, it captures the Christmas mood and if all the people on Steam play it, maybe we will have arguments to invite Brett to the sequel of the game (think about how cool it will be).

Thanks for your attention. I'll leave some generated description from chatGPT below (I didn't want to, but trends oblige)

Key Features:

- 30 handcrafted levels filled with variety and challenges.

- 3 epic boss battles against the goblin king and his minions.

- Beautiful, festive visuals that capture the holiday spirit.

- Charming soundtrack to keep you in the Christmas mood.

- Accessible gameplay for players of all ages.

linux_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Latest Debian redistributable or SteamOS
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Dedicated video card recommended
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Yosemite 10.10.5 or newer
  • Processor: Apple Silicon or Intel
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Integrated works fine
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

name: The battle for Christmas

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS *: Windows 7 and up
  • Processor: 1Ghz and up
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM
  • Storage: 500 MB available space

short_description: It's just another boring steam platformer from a piss-poor developer, mind you. Gameplay will take you an hour, but you will get 90 achievements
